name: Aliens Among Us
description:
Local conspiracy theorists are spreading rumors that aliens are being hidden on a nearby base. Grab your tin-foil hat, go knock on doors, and try to find clues that prove the theories are true before you get caught.

NOTE: This is a very low-poly game at the moment. Models include Unity primitives, buildings and perimeter walls modeled and exported from Blender, and the Mixamo xbot and ybot animated models.
